content: I'm glad you provided more information about Medellín. I was thinking about my previous family trip to Hawaii and how different it was from my solo travels. Anyway, back to Medellín... I'm concerned about the safety aspect, but it sounds like the city has made a lot of progress. Can you recommend some good Airbnb options in El Poblado or La Llanura? I'd like to stay in a safe and convenient area with access to good restaurants and transportation.
